description:
Goff Law Group has a personal injury law office in Shelton, Connecticut. Of course, it is connected to our statewide network of locations. Every client gets the benefit of our team of lawyers, high-tech communication tools and extensive legal knowledge.

A Focused Law Office

Our law firm is proud to help with practice personal injury cases. It is all we do - although we might be able to provide referrals for other areas of the law if our clients need them.

We focus on one practice area because it helps us provide the depth of knowledge and the experience that we believe is necessary to secure the best possible outcomes for our clients. Examples of cases include commercial truck accidents, car accidents, wrongful death, medical malpractice, animal bites - almost anything that results in serious injuries, disfigurement or disability.

An Aggressive Team

Goff Law Group is full of fighters. Our law firm tenaciously represents our clients, both in the courtroom and during negotiations.

Personal injury plaintiffs are often individuals or small groups going up against powerful insurance companies, corporations and property owners. We understand the challenge involved, and we prepare our cases to go the distance.

We have the resources, knowledge and commitment necessary to get the best possible case results for injured people. Free consultations are available. We meet at any of our multiple offices. Our law firm also communicates virtually through a wide variety of video-call and texting services.
